articles.title: Knorr-Bremse Group likely to buy Escorts Kubota's railway business for over Rs 4,000 crore: Exclusive - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Escorts Kubota's railway business is likely to fetch a sum of over Rs 4,000 crore, sources with knowledge of the matter told CNBC-TV18.
